All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminClickUserFragment
DialogFragment that displays user details and allows an admin to delete a user.
AdminEventArrayAdapter
Adapter class to display a list of events for admin users extending the EventArrayAdapter to include additional functionality specifically for admins.
AdminEventFragment
Fragment that displays event details for an admin and allows deletion of the event.
AdminGalleryFragment
Fragment that displays a gallery of users in a ListView, allowing the admin to view users and their associated images.
AdminHome
AdminHome activity serves as the main screen for the admin interface.
AdminHomeFragment
AdminHomeFragment displays a list of events for the admin.
AdminImageFragment
AdminImageFragment is responsible for displaying a list of users in the admin section of the app.
AdminImagesFragment
AdminImagesFragment is responsible for displaying a list of users in the admin section of the app.
AdminUserFragment
AdminUserFragment is responsible for displaying detailed information about a user in the admin section of the app.
AdminUsersFragment
AdminUsersFragment is responsible for displaying the list of users in the admin section of the app.
Announcement
Model class representing an Announcement for an event.
Attendee
Represents an attendee in an event queueing system.
AttendeeController
Controller class for managing Attendees in the Event Lottery System.
AttendeeEvent
AttendeeEvent is an activity that displays the details of a specific event for an attendee.
AttendeeEventArrayAdapter
Adapter class to display a list of events for attendee users, extending the EventArrayAdapter to provide additional functionality specifically for attendees.
AttendeeEventFragment
AttendeeEventFragment is a fragment that displays the details of an event for an attendee.
AttendeeHome
The AttendeeHome class represents the home screen for attendees.
AttendeeHomeFragment
AttendeeHomeFragment is a fragment that displays a list of events for an attendee.
AttendeeQRscanFragment
AttendeeQRscanFragment is an activity that allows the user to scan QR codes using the device's camera.
AttendeeViewModel
ViewModel for managing attendee-related data and operations.
AttendeeWaitlistFragment
AttendeeWaitlistFragment represents the fragment where an attendee can join an event's waitlist.
AttendeeWaitlistJoinedFragment
 
CurrentUserHandler
 
EditProfileActivity
EditProfileActivity provides functionality for users to edit their profile information, including updating their first name, last name, username, email, and phone number.
Event
Represents an event with comprehensive details including its schedule, location, organizer, and participant information.
EventArrayAdapter
Abstract adapter class for displaying a list of events, extending ArrayAdapter to provide a custom view for each event.
EventController
Controller class for handling events in the Event Lottery System.
EventUnitTest
 
EventViewModel
ViewModel for managing event-related data and operations.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
GeoLocation
Represents a geographical location with latitude and longitude coordinates.
Image
Represents an image stored in Firebase storage.
ImageController
ImageController manages image operations for uploading, retrieving, and deleting images from Firebase Firestore and Storage.
ImagesArrayAdapter
Adapter class to display a list of user-related images or file data, extending ArrayAdapter to provide a custom view for each item.
ImageUploader
 
ImageUploader.UploadListener
 
ImageViewHandler
 
ImageViewModel
ViewModel class responsible for managing and interacting with image data.
ImageViewModel.DeleteImageCallback
Callback interface for deleting images
MainActivity
 
OrganizerCreateEvent
OrganizerCreateEvent represents the activity where an organizer can create a new event.
OrganizerDrawFragment
OrganizerDrawFragment represents the fragment where the organizer can view event details, including event date, time, location, and poster image.
OrganizerEvent
OrganizerEvent activity displays the details of an event and allows the organizer to manage different aspects of the event.
OrganizerEventArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying event details in the organizer's event list.
OrganizerHome
OrganizerHome activity represents the home screen of an organizer, providing access to different functionalities such as managing events, viewing QR codes, and accessing the user's profile.
OrganizerHomeFragment
Fragment representing the home screen for an organizer, displaying a list of events they have created.
OrganizerQRCodesFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying a list of users with QR codes, likely for event check-ins or other organizer actions.
OrganizerWaitingListFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying a list of users on the event's waiting list.
ProfileFragment
ProfileFragment is responsible for displaying and managing the user's profile information.
QRCode
Represents a QR code associated with an event.
QRCodeImage
QRCodeImage is a utility class that provides functionality for generating QR code images based on a given text input.
QRController
QRController is responsible for managing QR code operations within the application.
QRViewModel
ViewModel responsible for handling QR code data in the application.
SignUp
SignUp activity allows new users to register by providing their details, uploading a profile picture, and selecting their role.
User
Represents a user in the system with attributes such as name, username, email address, phone number, profile image URL, and more.
UserController
UserController is responsible for managing user operations, such as creating, updating, and deleting users in the Firestore database.
UsersArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying user data in a list.
UserUnitTest
 
UserViewModel
ViewModel class that handles user-related operations such as loading, creating, updating, and managing user data in Firestore.
